title.content-text: 4.1.4 Options for Connecting to the ISP

brief.content-text:
Two Diagrams

Diagram 1, Image

Diagram depicts two methods for connecting to the ISP. The first is a single PC with direct connection. In this case, a PC connects to a modem, which in turn connects to the ISP cloud. The second method has multiple PC's connected to an integrated router. The router connects to the modem, which in turn connects to the ISP cloud.
